languages.text: "Вольный Торговец вынес{mf||ла} приговор! Сестра Джуд приговаривается к смерти за покушение на жизнь главы астропатического хора!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец вынес{mf||ла} приговор! Сестра Джуд приговаривается к смерти за покушение на жизнь главы астропатического хора!"

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|him|her} verdict! Sister Judh is sentenced to death for an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|him|her} verdict! Sister Judh is sentenced to death for an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|him|her} verdict! Sister Judh is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|him|her} verdict! Sister Judh is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat {mf|sein|ihr} Urteil gefällt! Schwester Juth wird hiermit wegen versuchten Mordes am Oberhaupt des astropathischen Chors zum Tode verurteilt."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat {mf|sein|ihr} Urteil gefällt! Schwester Juth wird hiermit wegen versuchten Mordes am Oberhaupt des astropathischen Chors zum Tode verurteilt."

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rendu son verdict ! Sœur Juth est donc condamnée à mort pour avoir attenté à la vie du chef du chœur astropathique ! »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a rendu son verdict ! Sœur Juth est donc condamnée à mort pour avoir attenté à la vie du chef du chœur astropathique ! »

languages.text: “行商浪人已经做出了判决！犹斯修女打算杀害星语唱诗班的唱诗大师，在此判处死刑！”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人已经做出了判决！犹斯修女打算杀害星语唱诗班的唱诗大师，在此判处死刑！”

languages.text: «¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dictado sentencia! ¡Se ejecutará inmediatamente a la hermana Juth por atentar contra la vida del líder del Coro de Astrópatas!».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: «¡{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dictado sentencia! ¡Se ejecutará inmediatamente a la hermana Juth por atentar contra la vida del líder del Coro de Astrópatas!».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは{mf|彼|彼女}の判決を下された！感応通信聖歌隊の隊長の命を狙った罪で、ここにシスター・ジュスの死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは{mf|彼|彼女}の判決を下された！感応通信聖歌隊の隊長の命を狙った罪で、ここにシスター・ジュスの死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir hükmünü verdi! Rahibe Juth, Astropatik Koro'nun başına suikast girişiminde bulunması sebebiyle idam cezasına çarptırılmıştır!"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|his|her} verdict! Sister Juth is hereby sentenced to death for making an attempt on the life of the head of the Astropathic Choir!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir hükmünü verdi! Rahibe Juth, Astropatik Koro'nun başına suikast girişiminde bulunması sebebiyle idam cezasına çarptırılmıştır!"
